text: Thanks! I managed to find something interesting though. It's composed and arranged by Shinji Hosoe. I love his work, specially Megaman Network Transmission. If you pay attention, both soundtracks are a bit similar.

text: This song and the picture got me interested into the game...but I found ABSOLUTELY ZERO data about it.
author: Zenju

text:
I checked it out, and it's called Treasures of Rudra. It never came to the US, but there's an English ROM of it somewhere.

Valis77 has a playthrough of it. I favorited one of the videos, so my profile can direct you to it.
author: Sephiko

text: Rudra?? hmm I think I never heard of it...I think.  Sounds vaaaguely familiar...Yeah I played a crapload of RPGs but not Rudra.
